import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./Myleave.css"; import Footer from "../Footer"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; export default function Myleave() { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get("https://ems-server-theta.vercel.app/staffList").then((result) => { setUsers(result.data); console.log(result.data); }); }, []); return ( <>
